me.alb_i986.selenium.tinafw.utils

Class TinafwPropLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.alb_i986.selenium.tinafw.utils.TinafwPropLoader

  • public class TinafwPropLoader
extends Object
    Static class defining a method for each and every property the system requires, with namespace "tinafw".

    It is backed by a PropertyLoader, which hides the low-level details of retrieving properties.

    Clients extending this framework, needing custom config properties should extend this class, and:

    • redefine (aka hide) the constant NAMESPACE with their own
    • define a private static method that uses propLoader (just like getTinaFwConfig(String))
    • define a public static method for each custom property, which delegate to the private method
    • should NOT redefine CUSTOM_PROPS_RESOURCE and DEFAULT_PROPS_RESOURCE
    See Also:
    PropertyLoader

      • getBrowsers

        public static List<SupportedBrowser> getBrowsers()
        Returns:
        a List of the SupportedBrowser's specified in the prop 'tinafw.browsers'
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the property 'tinafw.browsers' is not valid, i.e. one of its values cannot be converted to SupportedBrowser, or there are no browsers specified
        See Also:
        PropertiesUtils.split(String)
